A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson did a BEAUTIFUL job with this movie. His choices were visually stunning and\, when inspected on a deeper level\, make the scenes even better. Yes it didn't seem like your usual Star Wars movie but it did feel like a Disney action-packed fairytale\, something that will leave kids and even adults entranced and inspired. I thought the opening scene with Hux and Poe\, while funny and cute\, was not as strong as the rest of the film. Would definitely pay money to see again.
